title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 891/97 of 15 May 1997 opening a Community tariff quota for certain goods originating from Turkey (1997)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 891/97 of 15 May 1997 opening a Community tariff quota for certain goods originating from Turkey (1997)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Community tariff quota given in the Annex to this Regulation shall be opened from 1 January to 31 December 1997.
The Community tariff quota referred to in Article 1 shall be administered in accordance with the provisions of Article 10 of Regulation (EC) No 1460/96.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 May 1997.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 318, 20. 12. 1993, p. 18.
(2) See page 26 of this Official Journal.
(3) OJ No L 187, 26. 7. 1996, p. 18.
